required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety of Adding Alisporivir (DEB025) to Peginterferon (IFN) Alfa-2a (Peg-IFN Alfa-2a) and Ribavirin in Chronic HCV Genotype 1 Patients Who Relapsed or Did Not Respond to Previous Treatment
clinical_study.official_title: A Multicenter, Randomized, Double-blind, Placebo-controlled, Parallel-group Phase II Study on Efficacy and Safety of DEB025 Combined With Peg-IFN Alfa-2a and Ribavirin in Chronic Hepatitis C Genotype 1 Relapsers and Non-responders to Previous Peg-IFN Alfa-2 Plus Ribavirin Treatment

brief_summary.textblock: The study is to investigate whether participants with hepatitis C virus (HCV) genotype 1 who have a history of non-response/relapse to peginterferon alfa-2a (PEG) and ribavirin (RBV) may benefit from treatment with triple therapy alisporivir (ALV; DEB025) with PEG and RBV versus placebo with PEG and RBV.

primary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Participants With Complete Early Viral Response Below the Limit of Quantification (cEVR-LOQ)
primary_outcome.description: cEVR-LOQ was defined as serum HCV RNA below the limit of quantification (< LOQ; i.e., 25 IU/mL) after 12 weeks of treatment. Post-switch groups were assessed 12 weeks after the switch.

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Participants With Complete Early Viral Response Below the Limit of Detection (cEVR-LOD)
secondary_outcome.description: cEVR-LOD was defined as serum HCV RNA below the limit of detection (< LOD; i.e., 10 IU/mL) after 12 weeks of treatment. Post-switch groups were assessed 12 weeks after the switch.

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Participants Who Achieved Sustained Viral Response 12 Weeks After Treatment (SVR12)-LOQ and SVR12-LOD
secondary_outcome.description: SVR12-LOQ and SVR12-LOD were defined as serum HCV RNA < LOQ and serum HCV RNA < LOD 12 weeks after treatment, respectively.

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Participants Who Achieved Sustained Viral Response 24 Weeks After Treatment (SVR24)-LOQ and SVR24-LOD
secondary_outcome.description: SVR24-LOQ and SVR24-LOD were defined as serum HCV RNA < LOQ and serum HCV RNA < LOD 24 weeks after treatment, respectively.

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Participants With Rapid Viral Response (RVR)-LOQ and RVR-LOD
secondary_outcome.description: RVR-LOQ and RVR-LOD were defined as serum HCV RNA < LOQ and serum HCV RNA < LOD after 4 weeks of treatment, respectively. Post-switch groups were assessed 4 weeks after the switch.

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Participants With Partial Early Virologic Response After 12 Weeks of Treatment (pEVR)-LOQ and pEVR-LOD
secondary_outcome.description: pEVR-LOQ and pEVR-LOD were defined as a ≥ 2 log10 decrease in HCV RNA and still detectable (≥ LOQ and ≥ LOD, respectively) after 12 weeks of treatment. Post-switch groups were assessed 12 weeks after the switch.

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Participants With End of Treatment Response (ETR)-LOQ and ETR-LOD
secondary_outcome.description: ETR-LOQ and ETR-LOD were defined as serum HCV RNA < LOQ and serum HCV RNA < LOD at treatment end (completed or prematurely discontinued), respectively.

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Participants With Abnormal Alanine Aminotransferase (ALT) at Baseline Who Had Normalized ALT at Treatment End and Study End
Percentage of Participants With On-treatment Viral Breakthrough
secondary_outcome.description: On-treatment viral breakthrough was defined as either: Confirmed increase of HCV RNA ≥1 log10 above nadir (nadir = lowest HCV RNA value during treatment), or HCV RNA becoming ≥ 100 IU/mL after previously being undetectable (< LOQ) during treatment

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Participants With Viral Relapse
secondary_outcome.description: Viral relapse was defined as reappearance of detectable HCV RNA after previously being undetectable (< LOQ) during treatment.

arm_group.description: Alisporivir (ALV) 600 mg once daily (QD) with Peginterferon alfa-2a (PEG) and Ribavirin (RBV) for up to 48 weeks
Alisporivir (ALV) 800 mg QD with PEG and RBV for up to 48 weeks

arm_group.arm_group_label: Treatment C1: ALV Placebo - 600 mg QD
arm_group.description: ALV Placebo with PEG and RBV for up to 48 weeks; participants not achieving complete early virologic response (cEVR) after 12 weeks of treatment may switch to active ALV 600 mg QD with PEG and RBV.

arm_group.arm_group_label: Treatment C2: ALV Placebo - 400 mg BID
arm_group.description: ALV Placebo with PEG and RBV for up to 48 weeks; participants not achieving cEVR after 12 weeks of treatment may switch to active ALV 400 mg twice daily (BID) with PEG and RBV.
Alisporivir (ALV) 400 mg twice daily BID with PEG and RBV for up to 48 weeks

intervention.description: ALV 200 mg soft gel capsules administered orally
intervention.arm_group_label: Treatment C1: ALV Placebo - 600 mg QD
Treatment C2: ALV Placebo - 400 mg BID

intervention.description: PEG 180 μg administered via subcutaneous (s.c.) injection once weekly
intervention.arm_group_label: Treatment C1: ALV Placebo - 600 mg QD
Treatment C2: ALV Placebo - 400 mg BID

intervention.description: RBV 200 mg tablets (weight-based dose: < 75 mg = 1000 mg/day; ≥ 75 kg = 1200 mg/day) administered orally in a divided daily dose
intervention.arm_group_label: Treatment C1: ALV Placebo - 600 mg QD
Treatment C2: ALV Placebo - 400 mg BID

intervention.description: ALV placebo soft gel capsules administered orally
intervention.arm_group_label: Treatment C1: ALV Placebo - 600 mg QD
Treatment C2: ALV Placebo - 400 mg BID

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion criteria:
- Chronic HCV genotype 1 viral infection
- HCV RNA ≥ 1,000 IU/ml assessed by quantitative polymerase chain reaction (qPCR) or equivalent at screening
- Previous non-responders/relapsers to PEG and RBV after treatment for at least 12 weeks
Exclusion criteria:
- Treatment with any anti-HCV drug (whether approved or investigational) within 3 months prior to screening
- Women of child-bearing potential unless using highly effective
- Any other cause of relevant liver disease other than HCV
- Other protocol-defined inclusion/exclusion criteria may apply

group.title: Treatment A
group.description: Alisporivir (ALV; DEB025) 600 mg once daily (QD) with peginterferon alfa-2a (PEG) and ribavirin (RBV) for up to 48 weeks.

group.title: Treatment B
group.description: ALV 800 mg QD with PEG and RBV for up to 48 weeks.

group.title: Treatment C1
group.description: Treatment C subset C1: ALV placebo with PEG and RBV for up to 48 weeks; participants not achieving complete early virologic response (cEVR: hepatitis C virus (HCV) ribonucleic acid (RNA) <LOQ after 12 weeks of treatment) could switch to active ALV 600 mg QD with PEG and RBV.

group.title: Treatment C2
group.description: Treatment C subset C2: ALV placebo with PEG and RBV for up to 48 weeks; participants not achieving cEVR could switch to active ALV 400 mg twice daily (BID) with PEG and RBV.

group.title: Treatment D
group.description: ALV 400 mg BID with PEG and RBV for up to 48 weeks.

group.title: Treatment C1A
group.description: ALV 600 mg QD with PEG and RBV in participants not achieving cEVR in Treatment C subset C1.

group.title: Treatment C2A
group.description: ALV 400 mg BID with PEG and RBV in participants not achieving cEVR in Treatment C subset C2.

participants_list.participants: Participants in Treatment C1 who switched to active ALV
Participants in Treatment C2 who switched to active ALV

group.title: Treatment A
group.description: ALV 600 mg QD with PEG and RBV for up to 48 weeks.

group.title: Treatment B
group.description: ALV 800 mg QD with PEG and RBV for up to 48 weeks.

group.title: Treatment C
group.description: Treatment C1 + Treatment C2. ALV placebo with PEG and RBV for up to 48 weeks; participants not achieving cEVR could switch to active ALV.

group.title: Treatment D
group.description: ALV 400 mg BID with PEG and RBV for up to 48 weeks.

group.title: Total
group.description: Total of all reporting groups

outcome.description: cEVR-LOQ was defined as serum HCV RNA below the limit of quantification (< LOQ; i.e., 25 IU/mL) after 12 weeks of treatment. Post-switch groups were assessed 12 weeks after the switch.
outcome.population: Full Analysis Set (FAS) For Efficacy, defined as all randomized participants who were randomized after the 2nd protocol amendment

group.title: Treatment A: On-treatment AEs
group.description: Adverse events (AEs) occurring while on treatment in participants receiving ALV 600 mg QD with PEG and RBV for up to 48 weeks.

group.title: Treatment B: On-treatment AEs
group.description: AEs occurring while on treatment in participants receiving ALV 800 mg QD with PEG and RBV for up to 48 weeks.

group.title: Treatment C1: On-treatment AEs
group.description: AEs occurring while on treatment in participants receiving ALV placebo (and may have received ALV 600 mg QD post-switch) with PEG and RBV for up to 48 weeks.

group.title: Treatment C2: On-treatment AEs
group.description: AEs occurring while on treatment in participants receiving ALV placebo (and may have received ALV 400 mg BID post-switch) with PEG and RBV for up to 48 weeks.

group.title: Treatment D: On-treatment AEs
group.description: AEs occurring while on treatment in participants receiving ALV 400 mg BID with PEG and RBV for up to 48 weeks.

group.title: Treatment A: Post-treatment AEs
group.description: AEs occurring after end of treatment in participants receiving ALV 600 mg QD with PEG and RBV for up to 48 weeks.

group.title: Treatment B: Post-treatment AEs
group.description: AEs occurring after end of treatment in participants receiving ALV 800 mg QD with PEG and RBV for up to 48 weeks.

group.title: Treatment C1: Post-treatment AEs
group.description: AEs occurring while on treatment in participants receiving ALV placebo (and may have received ALV 600 mg QD post-switch) with PEG and RBV for up to 48 weeks.

group.title: Treatment C2: Post-treatment AEs
group.description: AEs occurring while on treatment in participants receiving ALV placebo (and may have received ALV 400 mg BID post-switch) with PEG and RBV for up to 48 weeks.

group.title: Treatment D: Post-treatment AEs
group.description: AEs occurring after end of treatment in participants receiving ALV 400 mg BID with PEG and RBV for up to 48 weeks.

category.title: Neoplasms benign, malignant and unspecified (incl cysts and polyps)

event.sub_title: Non-small cell lung cancer stage I

certain_agreements.pi_employee: Principal Investigators are NOT employed by the organization sponsoring the study.

clinical_results.limitations_and_caveats: In April 2012, ALV and placebo were discontinued in all participants. Participants remained on PEG and RBV treatment.
